Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antimicrobial peptides that have antibacterial and antifungal activity.
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Weakly or not expressed in absence of infection. Upon infection by D. coniospora, it is expressed in hypoderm. Also expressed in perivulval cells when D. coniospora spores adhere to this region.
Sequence Information.Induction: Upon D. coniospora and S. marcescens infection.

Literature.Title: Identification of neuropeptide-like protein gene families in Caenorhabditiselegans and other species.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2001 Nov 20;98(24)14000-14005.
Literature.Author: Nathoo AN, Moeller RA, Westlund BA, Hart AC.

Literature.Title: TLR-independent control of innate immunity in Caenorhabditis elegans by the TIR domain adaptor protein TIR-1, an ortholog of human SARM.
Literature.Author: Couillault C, Pujol N, Reboul J, Sabatier L, Guichou JF, Kohara Y, Ewbank JJ.
